alert.note: Alert for Northwest Yell County; Pope County Higher Elevations; Southern and Eastern Logan County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 11 at 9:44PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Logan, north central Yell and central Pope Counties through 1015 PM CST... At 943 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mt Nebo State Park, or near Russellville, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Russellville... Dardanelle... Pottsville... Dover... London... Hector... Lake Dardanelle State Park... Lake Dardanelle... Broomfield... Mt Nebo State Park... Mosley... Taral... Mt George... Chickalah... Pleasant Valley in Pope County... Gum Log... Caglesville... Moreland... Oak Grove in Pope County... Scottsville... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Northwest Yell County; Pope County Higher Elevations; Southern and Eastern Logan County
